column5: Has anyone any info or experience with Warwick lake/ bearberry outpost with Chimo outfitters out of red lake? Size, numbers etc.......

We fish Warwick in early Sept. and do,well, mostly on portage lakes Bullock and Copper. The largest walleye was a 29" on Warwick, 28" on Bullock. We like Copper for numbers plus fish are strong & healthy. Most of the time we fish 25 FOW with lindy or vertical jig. Are you booked or kicking tires?
